value.title: StarCraft 2: FLORENCIO'S CRAZY WORKER RUSH!
value.excerpt: Florencio loves going for crazy strategies in StarCraft 2. In this particular instance he's up against a Zerg player and decides to open up with a full on worker rush. Worker rushes in general are easily countered when you have a moment to think, but he has the element of surprise as he stacks them all

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.
